itunes:title: E27 - The Evolutionary Lens with Bret Weinstein & Heather Heying | Brave New Policies for a Brave New World | DarkHorse Podcast
title: E27 - The Evolutionary Lens with Bret Weinstein & Heather Heying | Brave New Policies for a Brave New World | DarkHorse Podcast
description:
In this 27th in a series of live discussions with Bret Weinstein and Heather Heying (both PhDs in Biology), we discuss the state of the world though an evolutionary lens. 

Find more from us on Bret’s website (https://bretweinstein.net) or Heather’s website (http://heatherheying.com). Become a member of the DarkHorse LiveStreams, and get access to an additional Q&A livestream every month. Join at Heather's Patreon. 

Like this content? Subscribe to the channel, like this video, follow us on twitter (@BretWeinstein, @HeatherEHeying), and consider helping us out by contributing to either of our Patreons or Bret’s Paypal. 

Theme Music: Thank you to Martin Molin of Wintergatan for providing us the rights to use their excellent music. https://youtu.be/IvUU8joBb1Q Q&A Link: https://youtu.be/-rWHfo8TDwg 

Support the show
content:encoded:

Find more from us on Bret’s website (https://bretweinstein.net) or Heather’s website (http://heatherheying.com). Become a member of the DarkHorse LiveStreams, and get access to an additional Q&A livestream every month. Join at Heather's Patreon.
